channel.title: I'm a little confused about adding in Clickingbuttons.java[PI]
channel.description:
I am starting to get confused about adding things in clickingbuttons.java. When you add something, how do you judge what the case is. Example:
[code] case ####: c.getPA().quest1(); } } [/code]
How do you know what the #### equal when putting a quest.
Greatly appreciated for a correct answer, Thanks, Arham
